price: Ka sε: Nkonimdie da no, wͻn a wͻannye annie no gyidie ho mma mfasoͻ mma wͻn, na yεmma wͻn εberε nso.
arabic: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul yawma al-fatḥi lā yanfaʿu alladhīna kafarū īmānuhum walā hum yunẓarūna
